へー
> Why Lua?
>  I then realised I wanted to extend the functionality, but didn't want to end up maintaining a bunch of vimscript I had just managed to hack into place

attachments.title: akinsho/nvim-toggleterm.lua
attachments.text: A neovim lua plugin to help easily manage multiple terminal windows - akinsho/nvim-toggleterm.lua
